titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress in honoring the American family.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Children, Family, Drugs, Alcohol.

bill.summary: 4/13/1988--Introduced. Declares that families must have affordable, quality support, including a job and economic security, health care, child and elder care, family leave, services for the elderly, quality education, equal opportunity, equal pay for work of equal value, shelter, and a safe environment.
